caseTitle: Ijaz Badshah v. The Secretary, Establishment Division, Govt. of Pakistan, Islamabad & others
tagline: The Court may judicially review the executive decision on the ground of proportionality and reasonableness. The petitioner (civil servant) without NOC travelled on five different passports by deceiving and impersonation as a businessman which is also an offence under Section 6 of the Passports Act, 1974. No latitude could be shown for conversion of penalty.
